K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-1: a'arya ba ra m'artha dharma bi dza ya n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-2: bod skad du; 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-5: bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par ga ya'i ri la dge slong mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-6: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-7: lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-11: dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-13: gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50a-14: drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-0: gdung ba lngas yan @50b lag chog pa lnga brgya yan lag dkar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-1: sha med cing rus mgo lpags kyis yog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-2: lto zhar zhing skra'i khur khyer ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-4: g-yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-5: lag na ril pa thogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-6: rgal bar 'dun pa rnams dang yang thabs cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar drang srong rnams kyi nang na lham me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-10: lug rnams kyi nang na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-11: srin bu me khyer gyi drung na nyi zla dang mtshungs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-12: rtsva ka shi'i me tog gi nang na mand'a ra ba'i yal ga dang 'dra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-13: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bya rog gis bskor ba dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi nang na nyis 'gyur du mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gtong ba [?] zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par mdzad cing glo g-yas g-yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-20: 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-21: dgra bcom pa brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:50b-25: dge bsnyen ma brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-3: rig sngags 'chang dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-8: nags khrod pa dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-9: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-10: bram ze dang khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-14: smra ba'i skad sna tshogs pa ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-15: lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-16: de nas 'khor chen po de the tshom du gyur nas phan tshun gdong du lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-18: rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-20: sengge bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang ba de dag thams cad lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas ji ltar phyung ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba ji @51b snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'dus par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-1: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-4: dge bsnyen ma gangg'a'i bye ma snyed dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po dpe med pa thogs te 'dir lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-14: mi ma yin pa du ma de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-15: de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mchod pa bla na med pas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-17: mi ma yin pa'i bar du'ang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-18: gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul ba phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad 'og min gyi gnas man chad du mngon par byung ste slar yang log go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-19: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul ba phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:51b-20: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad du nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-0: gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul ba phyung @52a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal pa'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-4: kye ma mi rnams kyi ni 'dren pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-5: sngon chad ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-6: skye rgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-7: de yis bdud sde thams cad mog mog bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-8: phan tshun dag tu tshig tu smra bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-9: kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-10: bdag cag ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lhags kye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-11: bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-12: dka' thub can bdag dka' thub can mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-13: nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-14: bdag 'khogs bdag bskams bde ba rnams las nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-15: bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-16: yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul gsum rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-17: bstan pa'i dgra rnams mog mog gyur par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-18: bstan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-19: sangs rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52a-21: dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-0: @52b gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-1: 'jig rten mgon pa sangs rgyas gyur cig mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-2: 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-3: sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas rnams kyis bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-4: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-5: cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-6: 'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-7: thub pa chos ni gang zhig gsung bar bzhed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-8: 'khor 'di thams cad 'bod cing mchis lags na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-9: sems can thugs brtse'i slad du bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-10: de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor de'i nang nas drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-11: kye gzhon nu re zhig kha rog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-12: kho bos dri ba dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-13: gal te kho bo'i dri ba khong du chud par byed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-14: de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming dang yang mthun no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-15: 'on te sred med kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-16: dbang phyug chen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul ba byed du bcug na 'dir ngo mtshar yang mi che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-18: sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis 'di 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis drang srong gi tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas drang srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-20: tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:52b-21: ci nus kyis dri ba dris shig dang rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-1: 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-3: sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-4: ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-5: sems can rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-6: nang na sems can phra ba khru gang tsam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-16: sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la drang srong chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-22: tshe bskal pa drug cu pa'i dri ba 'dri ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-24: de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-25: drang srong chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-26: ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-30: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-31: drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-32: yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-33: sems can zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-34: ma rig pa'i rkyen nas skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53a-35: rga shi'i bar du byung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-0: yang rgyu rkyen las @53b sems can skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-6: gang gi tshe yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med kyi grong du 'jug pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-9: yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-12: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-14: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-21: sems can yang gzhan ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-26: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-28: gal te sems can 'grib pa ma mchis 'phel ba ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-29: ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-33: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-34: gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-35: dbang med par 'chi bar mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:53b-37: gang rang gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-0: srin bu me khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis dzambu'i @54a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-1: gling snang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i rkyen gyis srin bu me khyer gyis dzambu'i gling snang bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-2: sems mdul ba'i dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no; ;drang srong chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-3: yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bra bar gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-4: khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-5: gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag khyi la yod cing dbang sgyur la'ang yod pa de'i tshe sems can 'grib pa'ang mi dmigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-7: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-8: goo ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-11: ngas phyin ci log dag bzlog pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-13: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-15: khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-19: ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma yin no; ;drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-22: goo ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-24: sems can mang du 'grogs pa la sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'di ci lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54a-26: khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-0: @54b sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-1: 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-3: gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-4: lhag ma sa bon gyi 'os su mi 'gyur ba de ci lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-5: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-7: rlung dang nyi mas shing tog rnams ma rung bar bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-9: drang srong chen po; de de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-10: las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnams ma rung bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-13: mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe srin bu rnams kyis zos so; ;kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-14: las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-18: sems can gyi nyes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-21: yang sems can gyi khams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-22: yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-24: sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-26: de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-27: yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-29: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-34: ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur pa bka' stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:54b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-1: kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-3: gal te bskal pas sreg par mi 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-4: chos kyi dbyings gnyis su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-7: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-9: gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-11: dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-12: drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa; 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:55a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-8: rnga bo che rnams brdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-9: dri za'i bdag po yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga pa'i sil snyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-10: lha'i bdug pa dri rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gis ngad bslang ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du ngad ldang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-12: se mo do rnams 'thor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-22: ba dan dag gis kyang mchod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-23: lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-24: mand'a ra ba chen po'i char 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-25: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang dga' mgu yi rang ste ji ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:60b-26: de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas man chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-1: chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-2: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-4: rgyu ma mchis par sh'aka thub de ring 'dir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-5: phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong ste; ;'khor 'di thams cad the tshom gyur lags na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-6: thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-7: mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-8: dga' bar gyur cing spro ba cher gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-9: rab tu dga' bas legs par bstod bgyis nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-10: kha cig 'di na bcom ldan legs zhes mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-11: brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-12: nam mkha'i gnas nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyang bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-13: mkha' las lha yi me tog char du 'bebs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-14: ma brdungs rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab 'byor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-16: khyod kyis drang srong chen po me sgron mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-0: drang srong chen po me sgron 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs @61b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-4: drang srong chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rjes su thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab las sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-8: bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-10: byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-11: skad dang skad ma yin par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-12: rgyal ba dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-13: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-14: khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-15: blo gros rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-16: rgya mtsho snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-17: mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-18: bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-19: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:61b-21: lha bye ba phrag gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-3: dge bsnyen ma stong phrag tshad med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-14: mi ma yin pa gangg'a'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-16: de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags kyi dbang pos zhal khebs par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-18: ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-19: kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-26: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-27: de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu mngon par byung nas slar log ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62a-28: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba @62b btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-2: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa ma mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-7: rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams kyi don du ljags 'di lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-8: rdzun mi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir ljags kyi dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-11: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bogs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-13: rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-16: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du gang zhig gis bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:62b-17: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang lung 'bogs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-0: 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed @63a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-3: zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-4: gang gis 'di la rim gro byas pa des nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-9: sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags pa'i sa phyogs de la sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-12: dzambu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du gyur par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-13: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gsum brjod dam brjod du bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-14: des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-16: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-17: yi ger 'brir 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde ba dang bcas bzhin du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-18: des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63a-21: sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-0: @63b gang dag mi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-2: gang gis sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-5: rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-9: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu byang chub song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-10: zhes bshad do; ;des mig lnga thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-11: dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-12: dran pa brjed pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-14: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-15: gzungs kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-16: gtsug gi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-17: dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-18: spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-19: yi ge med pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-20: chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal pa thob pa'i gzungs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-21: the tshom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-22: don dam pa'i rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:63b-23: de la sogs pa gzungs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-0: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong @64a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-1: mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-2: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-3: bsam bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-6: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa khyod la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-7: yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-9: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsti stang byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-12: mchod pa byas pa de ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mtha'am mu yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-15: dge ba'i rta ba dpag par nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-23: gang gis snyigs ma lnga'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir rgya par byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64a-25: gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mang po de snyed cig la na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-0: yo byad rnams @64b kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston par mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-1: khyod da dung du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-3: gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phyag mi byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-5: drang srong chen po me sgron dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-10: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-11: 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-12: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-004:64b-14: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
